column1: The UK government is not the same as the states

The UK government has come out in support of the British government's proposal to ban all abortions in the UK. The UK government announced last month that it would stop funding abortions if they were performed on a woman's "real" unborn child.
The government is not the same as the states and some in the UK have called for the abolition of abortion laws.
